entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:21 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
